dmca.title: DMCA ISP Notification www.superkozmetik.com /Kinerase
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Notifications [mailto:notifications@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2007 10:44 AM
To: abuse; Copyright; Legal Response
Subject: DMCA ISP Notification www.superkozmetik.com /Kinerase

 

 

2/22/2007


 


 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes                                                     

1333 Stemmons Pwy Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Re: Valeant Pharmaceuticals International - DMCA Notice of Copyright
Infringement

To Whom It May Concern:

This firm represents Valeant Pharmaceuticals International (Valeant) and
is duly authorized by Valeant to act on its behalf in Copyright and
other Intellectual Property matters.

 

This letter serves to inform you, as the Registered Agent for Internet
Hosting that copyrighted images owned by Valeant appear on a website
superkozmetik.com served by your company. 

 

The infringing images appear at the following URLs: 

 

http://www.superkozmetik.com/content/view/32/72/

A printout of these webpages, with the infringing images highlighted, is
also attached for your reference, although the URLs listed should be
sufficient to allow you to determine the exact location of the
infringing images. 

 

These images appear on Valeant's website and are Valeant's copyrighted
material. I have a good faith belief that the posting of these images
has not been authorized by Valeant or any of its agents.

 

Note that you may lose your "safe harbor" under the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act if these images are not taken down in an expeditious
manner. You are also encouraged to contact your customer who has posted
these images and demand that the customer cease this infringing
activity. Please be sure to retain all files and documents needed to
identify the subscriber responsible for posting the infringing images,
as we may need to issue subpoenas in the future to identify these
individuals.

 

I declare, under penalty of perjury, that the foregoing Notice of
Copyright Infringement is accurate, and that VCLM Law has been duly
authorized by its client, Valeant Pharmaceuticals International, to send
this notification.

 

If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance
Management Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to 
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in
writing.  Calls directly to Valeant will not be accepted.  

 

Sincerely,

VCLM Law



Lance C. Venable

Attorney at Law

 

 




Compliance Management

Net Enforcers, Inc

Compliance.management@netenforcers.com
